author: hwright
msg: Split a conditional into more rational subdivisions.  I can understand
uber-optimization, but this was ridiculous.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/update_editor.c
(check_wc_root): Handle the errors in a separate conditional, and then
look at the value of the returned entry.

author: gstein
msg: The "is_hidden" tests is effectively "something doesn't exist, and nothing
has been added there." Well... schedule-replace implies "something was
there, it has been deleted, and I'm replacing it with <X>." Since nothing
is "there", then sched-replace can never occur.
Remove the appendix. Useless organ.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/entries.c:
(svn_wc__entry_is_hidden): no need to test for sched-replace.

author: lgo
msg: Add currently failing test for 'blame -g', testing the blame output
after a simple merge.
Patch by: Alan Wood <Alan.Wood@clear.net.nz>
me
(make it work on non-windows platforms and other tweaks)
* subversion/tests/cmdline/blame_tests.py
(blame_output_after_merge): New test.

author: gstein
msg: Revamp the wcprop upgrading process.
- formats with many wcprop files will be consolidated into the wc.db
- formats with a single wcprops file will be ported to wc.db
- format 12 is inconsistent on its wcprops storage, so they will be dropped
We are still at format 12. While at 12, the wcprops will be migrated into
wc.db, but will dropped during the move to format 13.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/wc.h:
(SVN_WC__WCPROPS_LOST): add a symbol for f12 to detect when we should
just drop the wcprops.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/upgrade.c:
(read_one_proplist): utility function to read a proplist from a stream
and jam it into a larger hash of proplists.
(read_many_wcprops): new function to read multiple wcprops files and
construct a hash of proplists. much of the code was extracted from
convert_wcprops, and adjusted to use read_one_proplist.
(read_wcprops): remove the DB param (unused). use the read_one_proplist
function. add an svn_error_return.
(convert_wcprops): switch to DB/DIR_ABSPATH rather than ADM_ACCESS.
leave behind wcprops from an f12 working copy. read all the props from
many or a single file. load those into the wc.db. remove the code to
check for wcprops in wc.db first (should be empty)
(upgrade_format): pass DB/DIR_ABSPATH to convert_wcprops.

author: blair
msg: * contrib/client-side/wcgrep:
Alphabetically sort the administration directories to ignore.
